alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 3:49PM MST until August 12 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 349 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Cave Creek. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Cave Creek has risen and is flowing above county defined alarm and bankfull stages. Low water crossing will be impacted along Cave Creek HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Phoenix, Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek and Carefree. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
